About me

 
I am a PhD student in Applied Mathematics at Centre Borelli, Ecole Normale Supérieure Paris-Saclay, in the CHArt[S] research team. I am also attached to the Centre D'Analyse et de Mathématiques Sociales (CAMS), EHESS. My PhD project revolves around diffusion processes in graphs, especially in the context of information diffusion in social networks. I am supervised by Julien Randon-Furling, Jean-Pierre Nadal and Argyris Kalogeratos.

My research interest are numerous and include:
  • Temporal Point Processes
  • Graph Theory
  • Epidemic Processes
  • Opinion Dynamics
  • Computational Social Science
  • Visualization methods
